# awesome-card



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                                       | Type      | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `button` | `button`  | If `true`, the card would also act as a button. Default to `false`.                               | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `href`   | `href`    | If this presents and button is `true`, the card would act like an `a` tag using the given `href`. | `string`  | `undefined` |
